com.facebook.buck.core.rules

Interface ProviderCreationContext


  • public interface ProviderCreationContext
    The context given to LegacyProviderCompatibleDescription.createProviders(ProviderCreationContext, BuildTarget, BuildRuleArg).

    This is to be a subset of BuildRuleCreationContextWithTargetGraph, plus the ProviderInfoCollection of all the dependencies.
